!Water Dragon's Shamaness Parme: (Suddenly, an ethereal and sorrowful melody beings to flow from the Echo Crystal you received from Kanis. The Shamaness body is engulfed in a light, and her eyes come back into focus as she clutches her head and shrieks in pain. A moment later... (She seems to recover, although still appears somewhat disoriented.) Who...who...are you? And where... am I? [Quest _131_BirdInACage parme_131y_q0131_03.htm|"Explain what happened."]
